title.rendered: Arthodox Oil 100 ML Maintains Healthy Bones and Supports Joints

content.rendered:
• Arthodox oil is a specially formulated ayurvedic oil designed to support joint health, reduce pain, and inflammation, while promoting improved movement and flexibility.

  • This oil is perfect for individuals seeking natural relief from joint discomfort and stiffness, aiding in a more active and healthy lifestyle.The oil is made with pure and natural ingredients which is free from chemicals, ensuring safe and potent pain relief.

Key Benefits:

  • Pain Relief: Eases joint pain and discomfort.
  • Anti-Inflammatory: Reduces inflammation, providing relief from joint pain and stiffness.
  • Strengthens Joints: With deep tissue lubrication it helps maintain healthy joints for long-term wellness and mobility.
  • Flexibility & Mobility: Improves joint flexibility and reduces stiffness, promoting better movement.
  • Consistent use of Arthodox oil ensures smooth and comfortable movement.
  • Provides joint pain relief and nourishes deep joint tissues.

Direction of use: 

Take sufficient quantity of oil & apply on the affected part, massage gently to facilitate penetration. Leave it on. Fomentation may be done before application.
Ingredients: Nirgundi Oil,Nilgiri Oil,Dhatura Oil,Erend Oil,Lemon Grass Oil,Kalonji Oil,Spice Oil{Proprietary Blend) Blend Of Clove,Cinnamon, Nutmeg,zeylanicum, Myristica fragrans,Tej Patta, Ajwain, Til Oil,Kapur Oil,Gandhapura Tail,Gandhabiroja Tail.
Legal Disclaimer:Natural Herbal Formulations tend to change color over time. However, product efficacy remains unchanged.
